title: Megyn Cox: Confession #4
description: A Hollywood marriage that was only at it’s hottest when another woman became involved.More unexpected than the unknown number that flashed on Jenna’s cellphone was the voice that spoke to her when she answered the call. A one-time fling from long ago found it’s way pulled into the present when his current wife called a nameless number in his cell phone.The fourth confession of E.C. Towers' Starfucker: Erotic Shorts Series tells the story of how blind jealousy began an unforgettable night with the sexiest actress in town, Megyn Cox.
author: E.C. Towers
